item.title: DJT To Merge With TAE Technologies In $6B Deal, Targeting First Utility-Scale Fusion Plant In 2026
item.description: The newly combined company has announced plans to secure a site and begin construction of its first utility-scale fusion plant in 2026.

item.title: Why Are EVTV Shares Climbing Nearly 10% Today?

item.title: Telegram Joins Trust Wallet In Supporting Kraken’s Tokenized US Stocks
item.description: TON provides tokenized US stock trading on Telegram, giving historically and geographically excluded places access to global equity.
